---

### Solicitation for Console Servers for the Department of National Defence

#### Solicitation Number
SSC-23-00022495:T

#### Solicitation Type
Amended Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Collapse of Tender
The tender has expired.

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence requires a contract for the supply and delivery of Console Servers.

#### Procurement Method
This procurement will be competitive, using an open tenders process.

#### Desired Outcome
The prime contractor shall provide, install and test up to [insert number] console servers in accordance with the specifications and requirements outlined in the tender package.

#### Specifications
The console servers will be used to support the computing infrastructure for the installation of Department of National Defence (DND) systems.

#### Applicable Trade Agreements
This solicitation is open to contractors capable of complying with the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-P TRUE Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Guidelines
Prospective contractors must download and review the tender package for full details, including all technical requirements, terms, and conditions.

#### Contact Information
Raiyane Benchekroun
Email: raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 324-4061
Fax: (613) 960-6007
Address: Raiyane Benchekroun 180 rue Kent St, 13 Floor, Ottawa, ON, Canada
